kv15.10:5.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ, amoho kusalamūlaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi paññāti?
kv15.10:5.6: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ … pe …
kv15.10:5.10: Hañci natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ, amoho kusalamūlaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ sati samādhi paññā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.10:6.3: Atthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.10:6.6: natthi saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa phasso vedanā saññā cetanā cittanti?
kv15.10:6.19: sacittakassa maggabhāvanā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv15.10:7.3: Ye keci saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpajjanti, sabbe te asaññasattupikāti?
kv15.10:8.6: Hañci idhāpi asaññī tatrāpi asaññī, tena vata re vattabbe—
